mapper.select: SELECT count(midx) as count FROM bg_user where grade='S' where grade='G' where grade='B'

select a.midx,a.uname,a.id,a.grade,a.mileage,a.rdate,a.rdate1, sum(c.tot_price) as sum from bg_user a left join bg_order c on a.midx=c.midx left join bg_delivery b on c.order_idx = b.order_idx where (b.cancel = 'N' or b.cancel is null) and (b.refund = 'N' or b.refund is null ) and grade='S' and grade='G' and grade='B' group by a.midx order by a.midx DESC Limit #{startPost},#{scri.perPageNum}
